about_the_game:
Our game will immerse you in the atmosphere of a mystical story. Consonance with the feelings and imaginations of the hero, will make you experience real pleasure from the unfolding events.

Sali is a former court photographer for the criminal division.
His views on real reality will seem strange to us.
Life, as a process, does not interest him. The object of the hero's research is the manifestation of death and everything related to it.
An accident that happened to Sali reveals in him a mysterious gift. The acquisition of new abilities forced Sali to become an agent of the otherworldly forces in our world.
As he performs his duties, he unwittingly becomes embroiled in a violent confrontation of necrological beings that could lead to his terrible demise.

Sali's dreams:
"My trunk is gnawed by worms and insects. The winds have broken the dry branches where the dense crown once rumbled. My roots have rotted
away. I've forgotten the taste of earth juice.
Lone oak ... I stand on the top of a mound in the shrinking ring of a dense forest. But in every tree of the advancing green mass I can already see the beginnings of decay.
Reborn from the seed and breaking through from the Earth to the Sky, you are approaching the halls of Death. It is she who will lead you through the endless labyrinths of life cycles."

Deep Lake: Prologue is a kinetic novel with no choice, in the style of a gripping Gothic story.
A total of four episodes are planned. They will have a choice of storylines and different endings.
The fourth episode will contain different finals, performed in the genres: mystical tragedy, hentai horror, black trash and detective noir. .

✔ Non-linear visual novel with dramatic plot twists and turns.
✔ 100 Indie soundtrack, authentic visuals and lyrics immersing in a dark, mystical atmosphere.
✔ 88 - backgrounds, 20 - animation backgrounds.

Our game will immerse you in the atmosphere of a mystical story. Consonance with the feelings and imaginations of the hero, will make you experience real pleasure from the unfolding events.

Sali is a former court photographer for the criminal division.
His views on real reality will seem strange to us.

Lone oak ... I stand on the top of a mound in the shrinking ring of a dense forest. But in every tree of the advancing green mass I can already see the beginnings of decay.
Reborn from the seed and breaking through from the Earth to the Sky, you are approaching the halls of Death. It is she who will lead you through the endless labyrinths of life cycles."

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher (requires Metal)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X newst
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher (requires Metal)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Deep Lake: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP+ (x86)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: "Deep Lake: Prologue" visual novel In the neo-Gothic genre, with a psychological story. Our hero's name is Sali. Sali is a former forensic photographer for the crime department. The accident that happened to him reveals in him a mysterious gift that can lead him to a terrible death.
